galpy.df.Edf.__call__¶

Edf.__call__(call_in, t=None)¶
NAME:
__call__
PURPOSE:
evaluate the DF
INPUT:
Either:
  1. E - the energy
  2. Some orbit instance, whose E(t) method will be called; t is an optional second input
OUTPUT:
df(E) or df(Orbit(t))
HISTORY:
2010-07-12 - Written - Bovy (NYU)
